messages.title: This is your chance to change Britain's future.
messages.content: If you are unhappy with the way things are going on Brexit and on the NHS, then this is your moment. The choice could not be clearer. A Labour vote will mean more of the same. Your Labour MP supported Brexit in the referendum, and voted with UKIP and the Conservatives to give Theresa May a Brexit blank cheque. Every time we need Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party to stand up to this Government they fail.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promises to stand up against Tory Government and its hard Brexit plans, and to defend the NHS and schools.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election is going to be a close finish between me and Labour. If Labour wins, nothing will change.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposes hard Brexit plans and criticizes Labour MP for supporting Brexit in the referendum, and UKIP and Conservatives for giving Theresa May a Brexit blank cheque.
issues.governance: Criticizes Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party for failing to stand up to the Tory Government.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ben Sims is actively campaigning for local people and has already hit the ground running.

images.caption: A photograph of Ben Sims, Liberal Democrat candidate for Leyton & Wanstead.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Encourages to vote for Ben Sims as an MP who listens.
